Posts.Content:
Hello everyone, 
I am new posting here but VOWED to let you all know after my results were found to let you know how much this forum got me through my 2 weeks of hell waiting for my 2nd mamogram to them be turned into a biopsy scheduled and then the wait on that. Every waking moment I took reading and educating. I am not normal i guess but this scare really shook me up.
Posts.Title: Breast Biopsy Microcalcifications
